body_html: @dzhulgakov Right now we don't even support calling other functions, and it's a hard error in the frontend. In the future I think we're planning on letting users form whole "compilation units" where you can have mutually recursive functions, but I think they will all have to be marked as compiled, or it will be an error again.
body_text: @dzhulgakov Right now we don't even support calling other functions, and it's a hard error in the frontend. In the future I think we're planning on letting users form whole "compilation units" where you can have mutually recursive functions, but I think they will all have to be marked as compiled, or it will be an error again.
body: @dzhulgakov Right now we don't even support calling other functions, and it's a hard error in the frontend. In the future I think we're planning on letting users form whole "compilation units" where you can have mutually recursive functions, but I think they will all have to be marked as compiled, or it will be an error again.
